meanings.sent1: She enjoys reding adventure stories before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: I will be reding the new novel by my favorite author this weekend.
meanings.sent3: While reding the recipe, she accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were reding the words on the page, but his mind was elsewhere.
meanings.sent5: Reding the map carefully, she plotted the best route for their road trip.

meanings.definition: The act of reading or perusing.
meanings.sent1: Her reding of the newspaper every morning keeps her informed.
meanings.sent2: The teacher encouraged active reding of the textbook to improve comprehension.
meanings.sent3: His reding of the menu was interrupted by a loud sneeze from the neighboring table.
meanings.sent4: The reding of the ancient manuscript revealed hidden secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The reding of the play script brought the characters to life in her mind.

meanings.definition: The process of interpreting or understanding written or printed material.
meanings.sent1: His reding of the legal document helped him grasp its implications.
meanings.sent2: Effective reding of complex texts requires focus and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The reding of the cryptic message led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: She approached the reding of the poem with an open mind, ready to uncover its meaning.
meanings.sent5: Through careful reding of the instructions, he was able to assemble the furniture correctly.
